effect.gold_silver: Resets the target’s evasion to normal and prevents any further boosting until the target leaves the field. A ghost under this effect takes normal damage from normal and fighting moves. This move itself ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.
effect.crystal: Resets the target’s evasion to normal and prevents any further boosting until the target leaves the field. A ghost under this effect takes normal damage from normal and fighting moves. This move itself ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.

short_effect.gold_silver: Forces the target to have no Evade, and allows it to be hit by Normal and Fighting moves even if it’s a Ghost.
short_effect.crystal: Forces the target to have no Evade, and allows it to be hit by Normal and Fighting moves even if it’s a Ghost.
